title: Easter Social Dance
content: This will be our usual social dance (pair dancing - salsa, bachata), but weâ€™re also adding something a little extra for Easter fun:
Rueda de Casino (Salsa) and Rueda de Bachata (with new moves)
It's a great chance to practice what you've learned, try something new, and share some laughs.
Entry is $10 - all levels welcome, no partner needed (we rotate throughout the night). Whether you're new or experienced, come as you are!
Bring your Easter spirit, your dancing shoes, and let's make it a fun one.
See you on the dance floor!
